resources.string: By continuing, you are indicating that you accept our %1$s and %2$s.

string.name: fui_no_internet
string.translation_descripition: User message shown when sign-in is attempted while offline.

resources.string: Network error, check your Internet connection.
Enter your email address to continue
Please enter a first name and surname.

plurals.name: fui_error_weak_password
plurals.item: Password not strong enough. Use at least %1$d character and a mix of letters and numbers
Password not strong enough. Use at least %1$d characters and a mix of letters and numbers

resources.string: You\'ve already used %1$s. Sign in with %2$s to continue.
You\'ve already used %1$s to sign in. Enter your password for that account.

You\'ve already used %1$s. You can connect your %2$s account with %1$s by signing in with the email link below.\n\nFor this flow to successfully connect your %2$s account with this email, you have to open the link on the same device or browser.
Receive instructions to this email that explain how to reset your password.
Follow the instructions sent to %1$s to recover your password.
That email address doesn\'t match an existing account
A sign-in email with additional instructions was sent to %1$s. Check your email to complete sign-in.

Try these common fixes:
• Check if the email was marked as spam or filtered.
• Check your Internet connection.
• Check that you did not misspell your email.
• Check that your inbox space is not running out or other inbox settings related issues.
If the steps above didn\'t work, you can resend the email. Note that this will deactivate the link in the older email.
Try opening the link using the same device or browser where you started the sign-in process.
The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired or has already been used.
The session associated with this sign-in request has either expired or was cleared.
Confirm email to continue sign in

You originally intended to connect %1$s to your email account, but have opened the link on a different device where you are not signed in.\n\nIf you still want to connect your %1$s account, open the link on the same device on which you started sign-in. Otherwise, tap \'Continue\' to sign in on this device.
Enter the 6-digit code that we sent to
This phone number has been used too many times
There was a problem verifying your phone number
This code is no longer valid
By tapping “%1$s”, an SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.
By tapping “%1$s”, you are indicating that you accept our %2$s and %3$s. An SMS may be sent. Message & data rates may apply.
